posts.post_content:
I played a game against my friend and mid-game he casts this guy. My turn, and I [Doomblade](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Doomblade) the sucker and promptly bring him under my control with [Rise from the Grave](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Rise from the Grave). The turn after that I enchant him with [Phyresis](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Phyresis).  
  
I don't think I've ever seen my friend that angry.  
  
Point of the story, Inferno Titan with infect? *Sick.*
posts.html:

I don't think I've ever seen my friend that angry.

Point of the story, Inferno Titan with infect? Sick.

posts.post_content: Now that we've had a year to work with the Titans, I think it's pretty clear how powerful this card is. I liked him when he came out, and I still love him now. posts.post_content:
*Can his triggered effect be nullified by a removal spell (Doom Blade)? Because he can't deal damage if he isn't there anymore, right? Anyway, that makes him the worst Titan in the cycle if that's the case.*  
  
Unless you can counter it, the spell resolves and he does his damage. Doesn't matter if you Doom Blade him after he enters the battlefield.
posts.html:

Posted By: Sunski (10/21/2011 1:55:34 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: I played a standard tourney the other night running a mono red deck and went undefeated. Now I only run 2 of these in the deck but I run with 4 quicksilver amulets. Game winning combo ended up being a turn 6 victory. Played a [Goblin Fireslinger](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Goblin Fireslinger) turn 3. Turn 4 I dropped my [Quicksilver Amulet](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Quicksilver Amulet) and turn 5 laid him down, wiped 2 critters off the field and turn six I pumped him twice, pinged once, swung away and then [Fling](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Fling). 20 damage in one turn. WIN. Long winded point is that this card has great possibilities for ruining someone's day.
posts.html:
I played a standard tourney the other night running a mono red deck and went undefeated. Now I only run 2 of these in the deck but I run with 4 quicksilver amulets. Turn 4 I dropped my Quicksilver Amulet and turn 5 laid him down, wiped 2 critters off the field and turn six I pumped him twice, pinged once, swung away and then Fling. 20 damage in one turn. WIN. Long winded point is that this card has great possibilities for ruining someone's day.
